title: Mahjong At Home: Hawaiian Edition
description: Mahjong At Home: Aloha Edition — classic mahjong solitaire with a tropical/Aloha theme.

title: From Nerd to School Popular
description: Dress up and style: from nerd to cool! Transform shy nerd into the most popular girl.

title: Ellie Summer Spa Beauty Salon
description: Ellie Summer Spa Beauty Salon — a beauty simulation where you help Ellie prepare for summer with facials, skincare and styling.

title: Panda Tropical Wedding Story
description: Panda Tropical Wedding Story — dress/prepare the panda bride for a tropical wedding.

title: Mahjong At Home: Scandinavian Edition
description: Enjoy the calming beauty of Mahjong set in a Scandinavian landscape, with relaxing puzzles and serene Nordic backdrops.

title: Ellie Bachelorette Party
description: Dress up Ellie in sparkle and style for her bachelorette bash! Gowns, jewels, and heels to celebrate her special day.

title: Dunk Draw
description: Pull, aim, shoot! Jump from hoop to hoop and make a high score. Unlock new balls from the stars you collect!

title: Tower Buster
description: The war is here. Block by block, tower after tower, prove your tank's dominance and power!

title: Sheriffs Wrath
description: Be the sheriff and protect the town! Use your shooting skills to defeat the outlaws in this action-packed game.

title: Pixel Slime
description: Bounce off the platforms and make as many jumps as you can in this amazing 3D game!

title: Odd One Out
description: Find the odd one out in each level! Test your observation skills and beat all the levels.

title: Nut Physics
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you must move nuts to reach their destinations. Simple but addictive!

title: Minigolf Kingdom
description: Hop, jump, and bounce over obstacles and collect the purple star boxes in each level of this golf game.

title: Merge Mania
description: Zap those numbers by pitting them against one another! Let's see how much you score in this race against time!

title: Little Bouncing Guys
description: Hop, jump, and bounce over obstacles and collect the purple star boxes in each level.

title: Lane Battles
description: Race down the lanes and defeat your opponents! Collect power-ups to gain the advantage in this arcade racing game.

title: Jimbo Jump
description: Help Jimbo jump from platform to platform and reach the top! Avoid obstacles and collect coins in this fun platformer.

title: High or Low
description: It's a game of luck! What do your instincts say - will it be a high card, or a low card?

title: Hats Off
description: A fun color-matching puzzle game where you match colored hats to clear the board and reach the goal!

title: Cuby Zap
description: Shoot the red cubes until your lives run out. But be careful: don't shoot the blue ones!

title: Crazy Pizza
description: Nobody said that running a taco shop would be easy. Can you keep all of your customers happy?

title: Bubble Smash
description: Aim and Shoot to Merge and Fuse! Don't let the Bubbles touch ground, or you'll lose!

title: Bottle Shoot
description: Shoot bottles with perfect aim and timing. The more you shoot without missing, the higher your score!

title: Blackjack 21 Pro
description: Play the classic card game Blackjack! Try to beat the dealer and win big in this strategy card game.

title: Astro Knot
description: Untangle the cosmic knots in space! A relaxing puzzle game with beautiful visuals and satisfying gameplay.

title: Greedy Gnomes
description: Help the greedy gnomes collect as much treasure as possible! Solve puzzles and defeat enemies in this adventure.

title: Ludo With Friends
description: Play the classic board game Ludo with friends! Roll the dice, move your pieces, and be the first to reach home!

title: Block Adventure
description: In jungle lands where wild vines grow, drag and drop blocks in a vibrant flow. Match them right and hear them click!

title: Rollout
description: Roll your way through obstacles and reach the finish line! A fun and addictive rolling platformer game.

title: Tile Master
description: Match the tiles to create patterns and clear the board. A challenging logic puzzle game!

title: Bouncy
description: Bounce off the platforms and make as many jumps as you can in this amazing 3D game!

title: Solitaire Gold
description: Play the timeless Solitaire card game! Classic gameplay with beautiful gold-themed cards and relaxing music.

title: Crunching Ninjas
description: Master the art of ninja moves! A crazy action game with fast-paced gameplay and challenging levels.

title: Block Adventure Jungle Saga
description: Journey through jungle lands with block-matching puzzles! Match blocks and progress through exciting levels.

title: Flying School
description: Help cute birds learn to fly. Drag and aim to make them fly from one nest to the other.

title: BFF Retro Time Travel Fashion
description: Get the girls all set for a time travel adventure! Dress them up in outfits from different eras for fashion fun!

title: Snake and Ladder
description: Play the classic board game Snake and Ladders! Roll the dice, climb the ladders, and avoid the snakes!

title: Kingdom Fight 2
description: Help the Mexican gunfighters Pedro and Juana survive the attacks of bloodthirsty zombies!

title: Worms Puzzle
description: The little worms are out on an adventure. Change shapes and colors as you puzzle through beautiful landscapes.

title: Ludo Dash
description: Ludo Dash — fast-paced twist on the classic board game with racing mechanics.

title: Cricket Mania
description: You've got 3 wickets and an audience to impress! Make as many runs as you can in this cricket game!

title: Triple Tile Match Master
description: Triple Tile Match Master — match three or more tiles to clear board.

title: Monster Girls Back to School
description: Monster Girls Back to School — help the monster girls get ready for back to school!
